Package orbotix.robot.base

RobotProvider & associated lower level API commands

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DriveAlgorithm.OnConvertListener Interface for listener to receive conversion notifications.
DriveControl.ConnectionListener Interface to update a listener of connection events.
OrbBasicControl.EventListener Listener to be to notify the user of OrbBasic Events
RobotProvider.OnNoRobotsPairedListener Deprecated. replaced with DiscoveryListener.discoveryComplete(java.util.List) with an empty list A listener to be run when no robots are paired to device
RobotProvider.OnRobotConnectedListener Deprecated. replaced with ConnectionListener.onConnected(Robot) A listener to be run when a robot is connected.
RobotProvider.OnRobotConnectionFailedListener Deprecated. replaced with ConnectionListener.onConnectionFailed(Robot) A listener to be run when a robot failed to connect
RobotProvider.OnRobotDisconnectedListener Deprecated. replaced with ConnectionListener.onDisconnected(Robot) A listener to be run when a robot is disconnected
RobotProvider.OnRobotFoundListener Deprecated.
RobotProvider.OnRobotOneFoundListener Deprecated. replaced with ConnectionListener
 

Class Summary
DeviceAsyncData DeviceAsyncData is the abstract base class for asynchronous data received from the robot.
DeviceSensorsAsyncData Client code can receive sensor data from a Sphero by sending a SetDataStreamingCommand to initiate and configure the streaming of sensor data.
DirectControlStrategy Controls the robot directly.
DriveAlgorithm Abstract class that defines the behavior for drive algorithms that converts input coordinates to a heading and angle for a device.
DriveControl Singleton to manage driving a ball in touch(joystick) or with accelerometer data.
JoyStickDriveAlgorithm Objects of this class convert position of a view bounds into heading and speeds.
Macro Deprecated. Translated from RKMacro.m in RobotKit in the iOS SDK User: brandon Date: 9/26/11 Time: 4:00 PM
MacroEmitMarker This class is created in response to macro emit markers sent from Sphero while running a macro, and when it processes an emit marker command.
OrbBasicControl Orb Basic Controls for controlling Orb Basic programs on an Orbotix Robot.
RCDriveAlgorithm Class to convert slider values from a RC car style UI into roll commands.
Robot An available robotic device.
RobotControl Deprecated. see Sphero for controlling Orbotix Robots.
RobotProvider Discover and initiate connections to Orbotix Robots.
SelfLevelCompleteAsyncData Class to represent the Async response after the self level command has completed

Async data packet sent when Device is done self leveling.
SleepAsyncNotification A Sphero will send this async data packet 10 seconds before it goes to sleep.
TiltDriveAlgorithm Converts accelerometer coordinates into heading and speed values.
 

Enum Summary
DeviceAsyncData.Type
